title: Mastering the Educational Video Production Process Through Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with video editing tools and foundational understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: Learners must acquire immediately applicable video production skills in professional work environments, considering smartphone-centric limited-technology contexts

learning_goals: Develop video design documents aligned with educational objectives using a four-stage process: Plan-Design-Deliver-Reflect
By applying Reflective Practice techniques, the effectiveness of video content can be evaluated and improvement strategies can be derived.
When producing explanatory/informational videos, three or more visual and auditory elements can be integrated to stimulate learning motivation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
